EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Canadian Manufacturers of Nomex® and Kevlar® Fabrics, Threads & Apparel
EmailTemplate.name: DPS- DuPont™ Canadian Manufacturers Nomex®/Kevlar® Fabrics, Threads & Apparel
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Canadian Manufacturers of Nomex® and Kevlar® Fabrics, Threads & Apparel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar® and Nomex®.
Attached is the web address of a list of Canadian Manufacturers of Nomex® and Kevlar® Fabrics, Threads & Apparel.
Copy the following web address into your web browser. http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_CA/sales_support/nomex_kevlar_fabrics_threads.html
Thank you for your visit to DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar®, Tyvek® and other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
